activities: IQNavigator provides hosted and installable software solutions to the Global 2000 for services procurement, including the hiring of temporary workers and payment to the temporary worker agencies.  For hosted customers, IQNavigator performs data processing for these processes on behalf of the customer on personal data received from the EU about the contractors, including name, contact information, previous work experience, dates of availability to work as a contractor, hours worked and hourly rates.
contacttitle1: VP, Information Services and Security Officer
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: IQNavigator will cooperate with the European Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and comply with their advice; for Switzerland, IQNavigator will comply with the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
